field.name: summary
field.value: Implement a different coloring for non-syntax-colored sections

field.name: description
field.value:
While CONTRIB-42 and CONTRIB-44 are not implemented, it would be interesting to differentiate them from other blocks of text.
I would like to keep my NVelocity text as black (the default), but change the color inside <script> and <style> tags to dark gray. There's currently no option in VS "Fonts and Colors", starting with "NVelocity", in which I can make that change.
